snippet.title: Introducing the CURVEBALL Update | Full Stream VOD
snippet.description:
Bishop and John from Wushu Studios are here to give us a tour of the upcoming Curveball Update, which has just landed in the Public Test Realm! 

If you're playing in the Public Test Realm, make sure to take the survey, and give us feedback at all your favorite feedback channels! 

You can report bugs here: https://support.stateofdecay.com 
And you can chat on the #public-test-realm channel on our Discord: https://discord.gg/StateofDecay 

Play STATE OF DECAY 2 on Game Pass, or at https://store.steampowered.com/app/495420/State_of_Decay_2_Juggernaut_Edition/ 

You can bother Geoffrey (or watch his personal streams) here: 
https://twitter.com/Rangutang 
https://www.twitch.tv/derangutang 
https://www.youtube.com/user/deRangutang 

You can bother Joe (or watch his personal streams) here: 
https://twitter.com/jawafawa 
https://www.twitch.tv/ogjawafawa 

You can bother Brant here:
https://twitter.com/brantfitzgerald

Watch our streams live, Mondays at 3pm Pacific Time! 
https://www.twitch.tv/stateofdecay 
https://www.youtube.com/stateofdecay 

Join our official Discord: https://discord.gg/StateofDecay 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/undeadlabs 
Follow us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/undeadlabs 
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/realundeadlabs 

If you find any issues with the game, please contact us and let us help you! Our new feedback portal is at https://support.stateofdecay.com. You can also add your wishlist items (or vote on others!) for State of Decay 2. 

Thanks for watching! 
— the developers of State of Decay 2 -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/stateofdecay
